features: Supportive yet soft, stretchy recycled nylon/spandex jersey holds everything in place and secures valuables to the body; power-mesh panels vent heat
Breathable center-back pocket has space for a water bottle; pockets on both right and left torso provide plenty of storage for snacks, tools or electronics
Off-road-only, near-transparent mesh panels on quads dump heat on climbs or hot days
Soft, subtle silicone leg grips eliminate slip and chafe while keeping chamois in place
Dirt Roamer Jacket pocket nests between torso pockets on bibs; snap loops at waist can pair with our Dirt Craft Bike Shorts and Dirt Roamer Bike Shorts
Body: 4.2-oz 79% nylon/21% spandex stretch interlock knit with HeiQ® Fresh Tech durable odor control. Mesh panels: 4.7-oz 73% recycled nylon/27% spandex
